img_above_text:
![Foothills Walkthrough \(113\).png](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/7/7c/Foothills_Walkthrough_%28113%29.png)
You can expect it to throw out little orbs of poison continuously, covering the surrounding area and inflicting Poison Damage. Equip Antimiasma Powder so you can quickly use it if you get caught in one too many attacks.
img_below_text:
Just like stone bosses and the flint bosses from Chapter 5, most of the attacks from the Poison Chief will be charges and slams. It will try to use the weight of its body to attack while delivering smatterings of poison around the area.
Its charges can be avoided, by dashing out of the way just before it reaches you. A similar approach can be applied to dealing with its lunges and punches.
summary_promot:
You are shown an image extracted from a video game walkthrough or guide.


        
        Context:
        - Preceding Text: "![Foothills Walkthrough \(113\).png](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/7/7c/Foothills_Walkthrough_%28113%29.png)
You can expect it to throw out little orbs of poison continuously, covering the surrounding area and inflicting Poison Damage. Equip Antimiasma Powder so you can quickly use it if you get caught in one too many attacks."
        - Following Text: "Just like stone bosses and the flint bosses from Chapter 5, most of the attacks from the Poison Chief will be charges and slams. It will try to use the weight of its body to attack while delivering smatterings of poison around the area.
Its charges can be avoided, by dashing out of the way just before it reaches you. A similar approach can be applied to dealing with its lunges and punches."

        Your task:
        1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
        2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.
        3. Do **not** speculate beyond the visible content.
img_summary: The image depicts a large, rocky creature covered in moss and green orbs, likely representing the Poison Chief mentioned in the walkthrough. It is situated in a lush, forested area, with a player character positioned nearby, preparing for combat. The preceding and following text describe the Poison Chief's attacks, which include poison-inflicting orbs, charges, and slams, and recommend strategies such as using Antimiasma Powder and precise dodging to counter its moves.
